mapper.select: SELECT SCHEMA_NAME FROM information_schema.SCHEMATA WHERE SCHEMA_NAME LIKE concat('spring-cloud', '%')

SELECT t.TABLE_NAME as tableName, t.TABLE_COMMENT AS tableComment, t.ENGINE AS tableEngine, t.CREATE_TIME AS createTime FROM information_schema.TABLES t left join information_schema.TABLE_CONSTRAINTS tc on tc.TABLE_SCHEMA = t.TABLE_SCHEMA and tc.TABLE_NAME = t.TABLE_NAME where t.TABLE_SCHEMA = #{database}
and t.TABLE_NAME like #{nameLike}

SELECT COLUMN_NAME AS columnName, DATA_TYPE AS columnType, COLUMN_COMMENT AS columnComment, CASE COLUMN_KEY WHEN 'PRI' THEN true ELSE FALSE END AS primaryKey, 'equals' AS searchType, TRUE AS enableListView, TRUE AS enableFormView, FALSE AS enableListQuery FROM information_schema.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = #{database} and TABLE_NAME = #{tableName}
